Title: Young at Heart
Plot: Mulder becomes the target of someone from his past named John Barnett. He was a jewelry store robber with an itchy trigger finger that Mulder sent to prison when he first joined the Bureau. The only problem is that Barnett died four years ago.
GuestStars: Dick Anthony Williams, Alan Boyce, Christine Estabrook, Graham Jarvis, Robin Mossley, David Peterson, Merrilyn Gann, Gordon Tipple, Courtney Arciaga
